body:
Thanks for reporting this. I'll try to get a fix out on Monday.

On May 12, 2017 7:25 PM, "allen" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> as @shuuki4 <https://github.com/shuuki4> mentioned, one way to solve this
> is to reshape as [-1, beam_width] when batch size is dyanmic(None).
>
